TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeTypeMemberCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供可用來儲存一組 物件的簡單集合物件。The class provides a simple collection object that can be used to store a set of objects. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class. 範例會建立類別的新執行個體，並使用數種方法陳述式加入至集合，傳回其索引，新增或移除特定索引處的屬性。The example creates a new instance of the class and uses several methods to add statements to the collection, return their index, and add or remove attributes at a specific index point.
